plot: A visit to Lorraine, a land of contrast in the North-East of France, where blazing steelworks, dark coal mines and mining towns keep close to the peaceful greenery of its plains and rolling areas.
title: En passant par la Lorraine
plot_es: A visit to Lorraine, a land of contrast in the North-East of France, where blazing steelworks, dark coal mines and mining towns keep close to the peaceful greenery of its plains and rolling areas.
plot_en: A visit to Lorraine, a land of contrast in the North-East of France, where blazing steelworks, dark coal mines and mining towns keep close to the peaceful greenery of its plains and rolling areas.

produce.name: Forces et voix de la France
